name: Deadline Keep
description:
This game was made in 8 hours by a team of 5 people using one computer!

If you'd like to watch the chaos of it, head on over to

Additionally, if you'd like to play around with the unity files you can find them here.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1A_COxZT3LFKdelJrB0aNAhR9AHF_gnnm/view?usp=shari...

And please share them with us on twitter using the hashtag #JazzaGameJam - You have the right to muck around with these as much as you want, but to no commercial purpose - And ensure appropriate credits are given for assets/work.
